price: 29. Er was slechts een enkele afschuwelijke schreeuw en zie! Zij waren vernietigd.
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
